WITH CUTOFF_RS AS (select FR.*, case when (select count(*) from kakao_friends where STATUS = 2
AND from_id = FR.from_id AND to_id = FR.to_id
AND from_id =FR.to_id AND to_id = FR.from_id
AND ((from_id =FR.to_id and to_id = FR.from_id) or (from_id =FR.from_id and to_id = FR.to_id))
) <= 0 then '1' else '2' END AS CUTOFF_RS from kakao_friends FR where
from_id = #{userId})
to_id = #{userId})

A.USER_ID, A.NAME, DECODE(B.CUTOFF_RS,'1' , A.PROVIDER , null) AS PROVIDER, DECODE(B.CUTOFF_RS,'1' , A.PROFILE_IMAGE , null) AS PROFILE_IMAGE, DECODE(B.CUTOFF_RS,'1' , A.BACKGROUND_IMAGE , null) AS BACKGROUND_IMAGE, DECODE(B.CUTOFF_RS,'1' , A.CREATEAT , null) AS CREATEAT, DECODE(B.CUTOFF_RS,'1' , A.UPDATEAT , null) AS UPDATEAT
